en.bannerStart: This is a new service – your
en.bannerEnd: will help us to improve it.
en.warning: You cannot save the progress for the application so it is important you have everything you need before you get started.
en.heading: Submit an application to HM Courts and Tribunals Services
en.body: Use this service to upload and submit a completed application.
subBody: You might need to upload supporting documents with your completed application.
Some applications may ask for a fee, so make sure you have your payment details ready.
You will be asked a few simple questions. You can review the answers to these questions before you submit them with your application.

cy.bannerStart: Mae hwn yn wasanaeth newydd - bydd
cy.bannerEnd: eich adborth yn ein helpu ni i'w wella
cy.warning: You cannot save the progress for the application so it is important you have everything you need before you get started (welsh)
cy.heading: Submit an application to HM Courts and Tribunals Services(welsh)
cy.body: Defnyddiwch y gwasanaeth hwn i uwchlwytho a chyflwyno cais wedi’i gwblhau.
subBody: Efallai bydd arnoch angen uwchlwytho dogfennau ategol gyda'ch cais wedi'i gwblhau.
Gall rhai ceisiadau ofyn am ffi, felly gwnewch yn siwr bod gennych eich manylion talu wrth law.
Gofynnir i chi ateb ychydig o gwestiynau syml. Gallwch adolygu’r atebion i’r cwestiynau hyn cyn i chi gyflwyno’ch cais.
